typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulmnt
source(output(
		{ Org commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Recept de march} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		{Type doc vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_livr_e as string,
		ca_livr_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		year_month as string,
		reference as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		toroll as string,
		indexcols2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturation
source(output(
		Commande as string,
		{Référence Offre BA} as string,
		{Qté Cdée} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> association
source(output(
		DateOffre as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		Client as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Offre as string,
		CodeATC as string,
		Canal as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> offre
source(output(
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal début} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Département} as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		DR as string,
		{Code postal} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> refAtc
InnerJoin derive(ca_final = {CA facturé},
		qt_final = {Qté facturée},
		data_origin = "facturation avec matching",
		canal_final = iif( {Canal distribution}=="43" ,  "Chantier" , "Diffus" )) ~> DerivedColumn1
association select(mapColumn(
		Commande,
		no_offre = {Référence Offre BA},
		{Qté Cdée}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sAssociation
leftFacturationAvoir select(mapColumn(
		{Org commerciale} = { Org commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		year,
		yearmonth,
		reference,
		article = reference,
		HubSAPid,
		toreplicate,
		origin,
		no_offre,
		indexcols2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectfacturation
sEcoul, selectfacturation join(ecoulmnt@indexcols2 == selectfacturation@indexcols2,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerJoin
origin, sAssociation join({Document de vente} == Commande,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftFacturationAvoir
facturation derive(origin = "facturation") ~> origin
ecoulmnt derive(origin = "ecoulement") ~> sEcoul
sEcoul, selectfacturation join(ecoulmnt@indexcols2 == selectfacturation@indexcols2,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullleft
fullleft filter(isNull(selectfacturation@origin)) ~> filterLeft
filterLeft derive({Canal distribution} = "42",
		ca_final = toString(-1*toDouble(ca_ecoulement)),
		qt_final = toString(-1*toDouble(qte_ecc)),
		data_origin = "decrementation ecoulement sans matching") ~> newColumnsLeft
sEcoul, selectfacturation join(ecoulmnt@indexcols2 == selectfacturation@indexcols2,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullRght
fullRght filter(isNull(sEcoul@origin)) ~> filterRight
filterRight derive(ca_final = {CA facturé},
		qt_final = {Qté facturée},
		data_origin = "facturation sans ecoulement",
		marque_name = iif({Org commerciale}=="1604", "SaunierDuval", "Vaillant"),
		canal_final = iif( {Canal distribution}=="43" ,  "Chantier" , "Diffus" )) ~> newColumnsRight
newColumnsRight select(mapColumn(
		marque_id = {Org commerciale},
		marque_name,
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString = {Recept de march},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		year = selectfacturation@year,
		yearmonth = selectfacturation@yearmonth,
		reference = selectfacturation@reference,
		article = selectfacturation@reference,
		HubSAPid = selectfacturation@HubSAPid,
		toreplicate = selectfacturation@toreplicate,
		indexcols2 = selectfacturation@indexcols2,
		origin = selectfacturation@origin,
		no_offre,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		canal_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endRight
addCanalFinal select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth = ecoulmnt@yearmonth,
		year = ecoulmnt@year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid = ecoulmnt@HubSAPid,
		reference = ecoulmnt@reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		toreplicate = ecoulmnt@toreplicate,
		dd,
		indexcols2 = ecoulmnt@indexcols2,
		origin = sEcoul@origin,
		qt_final,
		ca_final,
		data_origin,
		{Canal distribution},
		canal_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endLeft
Select4 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endjoin
dropColumnsInCommon, endRight union(byName: true)~> UnionEndRight
DerivedColumn1, selectOffre join(no_offre == Offre,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinOffre
uniqueOffreCanalATC select(mapColumn(
		Offre,
		{ATC performance} = ATC,
		{offre canal} = canal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectOffre
DerivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc = {Code postal},
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectATC
refAtc aggregate(groupBy(Marque,
		{Canal final},
		{Code postal}),
	ATC = max(ATC),
		NomATC = max(NomATC),
		Matricule = max(Matricule)) ~> unique
JoinOffre select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth = ecoulmnt@yearmonth,
		year = ecoulmnt@year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid = ecoulmnt@HubSAPid,
		reference = ecoulmnt@reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		toreplicate = ecoulmnt@toreplicate,
		dd,
		{ Org commerciale} = {Org commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		year = selectfacturation@year,
		yearmonth = selectfacturation@yearmonth,
		reference = selectfacturation@reference,
		article = selectfacturation@reference,
		HubSAPid = selectfacturation@HubSAPid,
		toreplicate = selectfacturation@toreplicate,
		indexcols2 = selectfacturation@indexcols2,
		origin = selectfacturation@origin,
		no_offre,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		canal_final,
		{ATC performance}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
endjoin, endDecrementation union(byName: true)~> UnionEndLeft
newColumnsLeft derive(canal_final = iif( {Canal distribution}=="43" ,  "Chantier" , "Diffus" )) ~> addCanalFinal
renameColumns aggregate(groupBy(Offre,
		canal,
		ATC),
	DateOffre = first(DateOffre)) ~> uniqueOffreCanalATC
marqueName select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		article = reference,
		{Code postal},
		marque_id = marque,
		marque_name,
		{Canal distribution},
		canal_final,
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		no_offre,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		{ATC performance}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns1
UnionpositiveEc derive(marque_name = iif(marque=="1604", "SaunierDuval", "Vaillant"),
		{Code postal} = toInteger({Code postal})) ~> marqueName
RemoveColumns1, selectATC join(marque_name == Marque
	&& canal_final == {Canal final}
	&& iif(data_origin=="decrementation ecoulement sans matching", -5, {Code postal}) == code_postal_atc,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinAtc
JoinAtc select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque_id,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		no_offre,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		canal_final,
		{ATC performance},
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommon
UnionEndRight select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque_id,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		no_offre,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		canal_final,
		{ATC performance},
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommon2
offre select(mapColumn(
		DateOffre,
		{Référence},
		Marque,
		{Quantité},
		Client,
		Responsable,
		Offre,
		ATC = CodeATC,
		canal = Canal,
		Produit,
		{Créateur offre}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameColumns
endLeft derive(data_origin = "ecoulement sans matching",
		ca_final = ca_ecoulement,
		qt_final = toString(-1*toDouble(qt_final))) ~> positifEc
UnionEndLeft, positifEc union(byName: true)~> UnionpositiveEc
unique derive({Code postal} = toInteger({Code postal})) ~> DerivedColumn2
endLeft select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		toreplicate,
		dd,
		indexcols2,
		origin,
		qt_final,
		ca_final,
		data_origin,
		{Canal distribution},
		canal_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endDecrementation
dropColumnsInCommon2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		is_prix_dsc as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{R�cept. de march.} as string,
		Right_reference as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		Right_HubSAPid as string,
		{Type_Facturation�} as string,
		qt_fact as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		canal_final as string,
		Commande as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		canal as string,
		RowCount as string,
		ATC as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		date_id as string,
		HubName as string,
		id_canal_final as string,
		{qte plateforme final} as string,
		{ca plateforme final} as string,
		Sum_qt_factur_e as string,
		Sum_ca_factur_ as string,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement as string,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement as string,
		code_depot as string,
		id_canal as string,
		marque_code as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		Client as string,
		Marque as string,
		{ATC Corrig�} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		marque_id as string,
		Offre as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['OModelPartedis.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> OModelPartedis
